mapper.sql: FID, FDeptID, FDeptName, FCenterId, FWindowId, FStaffID, FStaffName, FCallCode, FCustName, FCustMobile, FItemID, FItemName, FCreateDate, FBeginTime, FEndTime, FDuration, FQuestion, FAnswer, FEvaluate

mapper.insert:

update t_evaluate
FID = #{record.ID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FDeptID = #{record.deptID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FDeptName = #{record.deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCenterId = #{record.centerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FWindowId = #{record.windowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_evaluate set FID = #{record.ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FDeptID = #{record.deptID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FDeptName = #{record.deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCenterId = #{record.centerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FWindowId = #{record.windowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FStaffID = #{record.staffID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FStaffName = #{record.staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCallCode = #{record.callCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCustName = #{record.custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCustMobile = #{record.custMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FItemID = #{record.itemID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FItemName = #{record.itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCreateDate = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, FBeginTime = #{record.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEndTime = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FDuration = #{record.duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FQuestion = #{record.question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAnswer = #{record.answer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FEvaluate = #{record.evaluate,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_evaluate
FDeptID = #{deptID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FDeptName = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCenterId = #{centerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FWindowId = #{windowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FStaffID = #{staffID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FItemName = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCreateDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
FBeginTime = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FEndTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FDuration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FQuestion = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAnswer = #{answer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FEvaluate = #{evaluate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where FID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_evaluate set FDeptID = #{deptID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FDeptName = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCenterId = #{centerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FWindowId = #{windowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FStaffID = #{staffID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FStaffName = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCallCode = #{callCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCustName = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCustMobile = #{custMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FItemID = #{itemID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FItemName = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCreateDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, FBeginTime = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEndTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FDuration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FQuestion = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAnswer = #{answer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FEvaluate = #{evaluate,jdbcType=INTEGER} where FID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select l.FLabel from t_evaluate e inner join t_evaluate_label l on e.FID = l.FEvaluateID where e.FStaffID = 1 and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= e.FCreateDate and e.FEvaluate is not null and l.FLabel is not null GROUP BY l.FLabel ORDER BY count(l.FLabel) desc;
